    public class ButtonWithIcon
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.TextButton
    Buttons that use given background images (one for the default state and one for the clicked state)
    Author:
    andrew

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonWithIcon

        public ButtonWithIcon(java.lang.String text,
                      java.lang.String texturePath,
                      java.lang.String up,
                      java.lang.String down,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.ClickListener click)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        text - The text that is to appear on the button
        texturePath - The location of the texture file that is to be used by the button is stored
        up - The name of the image that is to be used when the button is in the up state
        down - The name of the image that is to be used when the button is in the down state
        click - The clickLister that is to be called when the button is clicked

                      java.lang.String up,
                      java.lang.String down)
        Change the images used by the button
        Parameters:
        texturePath - The location of the texture file that is to be used by the button is stored
        up - The name of the image that is to be used when the button is in the up state
        down - The name of the image that is to be used when the button is in the down state
